item.title: Launching a new course at TUM - Software Engineering Lab
item.description:
We are launching a new course at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Technical University of Munich, Germany. The course is called Software Engineering Lab and is part of the Bachelor in Electrical and Computer Engineering (BSEI).

  • Find all details about the course: Software Engineering Lab
  • Check the course page at the chair: Chair of Media Technology
  • Read our publication: Teaching Software Engineering As Programming Over Time

item.title: Press Release - New early warning system for self-driving cars
item.description:
• Read our publication: Introspective Failure Prediction for Autonomous Driving Using Late Fusion of State and Camera Information
